titleStmt.title: The right receiving of Christ· Or, An appendix to the worthy communicant, or A treatise shewing the due order of receiving the sacrament. By Jer. Dyke, late minister of Epping in Essex. Which was intended by the said author in his life time to be annexed to this treatise of the sacrament; as appeares in the epistle. Wherein a Christian may know, whether he hath rightly received Christ in the sacrament or no.
titleStmt.author: Dyke, Jeremiah, 1584-1639.

titleStmt.title: The right receiving of Christ· Or, An appendix to the worthy communicant, or A treatise shewing the due order of receiving the sacrament. By Jer. Dyke, late minister of Epping in Essex. Which was intended by the said author in his life time to be annexed to this treatise of the sacrament; as appeares in the epistle. Wherein a Christian may know, whether he hath rightly received Christ in the sacrament or no.
titleStmt.author: Dyke, Jeremiah, 1584-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. Simmons for John Rothwell at the signe of the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
